original_text: Now Herod was angry with the people of Tyre and Sidon, and they came to him with one accord, and having persuaded Blastus, the king's chamberlain, they asked for peace, because their country depended on the king's country for food.
korean_text: 헤롯이 두로와 시돈 사람들을 대단히 노여워하니 그들의 지방이 왕국에서 나는 양식을 먹는 까닭에 한마음으로 그에게 나아와 왕의 침소 맡은 신하 블라스도를 설득하여 화목하기를 청한지라

sentences.original_text: Now Herod was angry with the people of Tyre and Sidon
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 헤롯은 두로와 시돈 사람들에게 분노하였고

sentences.original_text: and they came to him with one accord
because their country depended on the king's country for food
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그들의 나라가 왕의 나라에서 양식을 얻었기 때문이었다
